# uptime_integration_microsoft_teams (Resource)

Microsoft Teams integration resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptime_integration_microsoft_teams" "example" {
  name        = "My Microsoft Teams Integration"
  webhook_url = "https://outlook.office.com/webhook/your-webhook-url"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) Microsoft Teams webhook URL

### Optional

- `contact_groups` (Set of String) List of contact group names to receive notifications. 
Each contact group can contain multiple contacts (email addresses, phone numbers, or integrations) 
that will be notified when alerts are triggered. Defaults to ['Default'] if not specified.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `url` (String)
